name: Adventures of crazzzzy squirrel which has been named Biggus Dihhus by HER silly dad
name_original: Adventures of crazzzzy squirrel which has been named Biggus Dihhus by HER silly dad
description:
Suirrel game:

Collect shrooms and acorn. Eat to not die, bring food to your family under the root, to not let them die.

Squirrel can climb trees and jump.

Team:
Constantine Romakhov - design and programming
Sergei Sanko - UI programming
Alexandr Ulitnikov - programming
Jimmy Black - level design
